Title: Authorizes the county of Suffolk to alienate and discontinue the use of certain parklands
Summary: Authorizes Suffolk county to alienate and discontinue the use of certain parklands and to convey such lands to Sunrise Wind, LLC for the purpose of constructing, maintaining and operating a subterranean conduit and electrical distribution cable system, together with subterranean transition joint bays and link boxes.
ActClause: AN ACT authorizing the county of Suffolk to alienate and discontinue the use of certain parklands and to convey such lands to Sunrise Wind, LLC for certain purposes
